pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)64$(br)$(#bd951a)Damage:$()$(#ff0000)7$(br)$(#bd951a)Speed:$()$(#ff0000)Normal$(br2)$(#bd951a)Conehead Zombie shuffled mindlessly forward like every other zombie. But something made him stop, made him pick up a traffic cone and stick it on his head. Oh yeah. He likes to party.

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)His traffic cone headpiece makes him twice as tough as normal zombies.
